title: Голубой пластиковый пакет
author: Rojas Mario
description:
This artpiece by Costa-Rica artist is done with oil on canvas. 'The Blue Plastic Bag' is related to surrealism being a representative of still-life genre. Sometimes it just takes breath when looking at the painting that looks like a picture. Nice. 

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
